doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Mrinal Kanti Roy
doctor.specialty: Urology (Kidney, Ureters, Bladder, Prostate) Specialist & Surgeon
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Mrinal Kanti Roy is a Urologist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Surgery), MS (Urology). He is a Former Professor & Head, Urology at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Mrinal Kanti Roy at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh is 11am to 2pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Afzalur Rahman
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Afzalur Rahman is a Urologist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MS (Urology), URC (Singapore). He is a Assistant Professor, Urology at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Sodesh Hospital, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Afzalur Rahman at Sodesh Hospital, Mymensingh is 4pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).
